name: mailtrap-mcpb
description: Send emails and manage templates using Mailtrap
long_description:
**[Mailtrap.io](https://mailtrap.io)** is a comprehensive email platform that helps developers and teams test, debug, and deliver emails safely. It provides both email testing (sandbox) and email delivery services. 
 This MCP (Model Context Protocol) server provides AI assistants with the ability to: 
 - **Send emails** via Mailtrap's delivery API 
 - **Test emails** using Mailtrap's sandbox environment 
 - **Manage email templates** (create, update, delete, list).

tools.name: send-email
tools.description: Send emails via Mailtrap's delivery API with support for HTML/text content and multiple recipients.

tools.name: send-sandbox-email
tools.description: Send test emails to Mailtrap's sandbox environment without delivering to real recipients.

tools.name: create-template
tools.description: Create a new email template in Mailtrap.

tools.name: update-template
tools.description: Update an existing email template in Mailtrap.

tools.name: delete-template
tools.description: Delete an email template from Mailtrap.

tools.name: list-templates
tools.description: List all email templates in your Mailtrap account.

mailtrap_api_token.title: Mailtrap API Token
mailtrap_api_token.description: Your Mailtrap API token for authentication. Get your token at: https://mailtrap.io/api-tokens

default_from_email.title: Default From Email
default_from_email.description: Default sender email address (optional, but required for sending emails). Domain must be verified in Mailtrap: https://mailtrap.io/sending/domains

mailtrap_account_id.title: Mailtrap Account ID
mailtrap_account_id.description: Your Mailtrap account ID (optional). Find it at: https://mailtrap.io/account-management

mailtrap_test_inbox_id.title: Mailtrap Sandbox ID
mailtrap_test_inbox_id.description: Sandbox ID for sandbox mode (optional). Find it at: https://mailtrap.io/inboxes
